subject: Sleep
title: REM as Overnight Therapy
description: A quick, practical guide to REM as Overnight Therapy.

hook.text: Time heals all wounds, they say. But it's not time that heals. It's the REM sleep that occurs within that time.

buildup.text: During REM, the brain replays emotional memories in a neurochemical environment free of stress chemicals.

discovery.text: Norepinephrine is completely absent during REM. Memories replay without triggering the fight-or-flight response.

twist.text: This is why grief softens over weeks. Each night's REM gently separates the memory from its painful charge.

climax.text: REM sleep is emotional first aid, processing pain while you're unconscious so mornings feel lighter.

punchline.text: REM sleep is therapy you get for free every night.

quiz.question: Why is norepinephrine absence during REM important?
options: It allows emotional memories to replay without stress
